Class SuspiciousGuard

  • java.lang.Object

    public class SuspiciousGuard
extends Guard
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SuspiciousGuard(int xP, int yP, char Elm)
      Creates a Guard of the Suspicious type(the one that randomly starts walking in the opposite direction)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getMoveGuard()
      Gets the move that the guard is supposed to do by using the variable iterator to check the move char in predefined move set array, and updates the iterator accordingly so that the next move set is ready to be check
      boolean update(Map currentmap, char heromove)
      Updates the guard characteristic and then Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn

    • Constructor Detail

      • SuspiciousGuard

        public SuspiciousGuard(int xP,
                       int yP,
                       char Elm)
        Creates a Guard of the Suspicious type(the one that randomly starts walking in the opposite direction)
        Parameters:
        xP - Suspicious's matrix position - Line
        yP - Suspicious's matrix position - Column
        Elm - Char that represents the Suspicious in the matrix

    • Method Detail

      • getMoveGuard

        public char getMoveGuard()
        Description copied from class: Guard
        Gets the move that the guard is supposed to do by using the variable iterator to check the move char in predefined move set array, and updates the iterator accordingly so that the next move set is ready to be check
        Overrides:
        getMoveGuard in class Guard
        Returns:
        the char that represents the move of the guard

      • update

        public boolean update(Map currentmap,
                      char heromove)
        Updates the guard characteristic and then Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn
        Overrides:
        update in class Guard
        Parameters:
        currentmap - map where the character position is set
        heromove - char that represents the move that the character is supossed to do
        Returns:
        true if the character has been moved, else returns false
